entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
